openapi: 3.0.3

info:
  title: Fogos.pt
  description: Fogos.pt Official API Documentation
  version: 1.0.0
  contact:
    name: Tomahock
    email: mail@fogos.pt

servers:
  - url: 'https://api-dev.fogos.pt'
    description: Development Server
  - url: 'https://api.fogos.pt'
    description: Production Server

tags:
  - name: Assets
  - name: Fires
  - name: Misc
  - name: Stats
  - name: Warnings
  - name: V2

    $ref: './assets/paths/legacy-v1-aerial.yaml'

  /v1/now:

  /v1/risk:

  /v1/status:
